trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Coats
There were no other sightings in Coats on or around February 8th 2007
Summary: row of 4 stationary lights that stayed at treetop level w/no noise
divs: Sighting DetailsI went to outside to start my car at app. 5:55 am. It was still dark. I noticed 4 bright lights in the sky at treetop level. I walked closer to the treeline. The lights didn't move and I didn't hear any noise at all. I went back inside and approximately 7 minutes later I went back outside. The lights were gone.
